originalText.text: If you‚Äôve never had a facial done before then I highly recommend you go to CityGlow in the East Village, I left feeling absolutely incredible! The personalized attention, relaxing atmosphere, and experience was so relaxing, which left me feeling truly glowing. Your business is amazing, and I'm so proud of what you've created!

originalText.text: Best facial.and tanning in NYC! Love love love this place and these ladies. I've been going to the City Glow girls for four years and even though I've moved to Brooklyn I'll never go anywhere else. Svetlana and Anya are always upskilling themselves on the latest techniques and go above and beyond to provide top quality treatments. I always come out of my appointments feeling and looking ten times better. Can't wait for my next visit!

originalText.text: Love the facials here so much. Lana and Anya are great and so knowledgeable. Not pushy like other salons, yet very informative. Sweetest girls ever! My fav. here compared to other salons is the facial massage that incorporate in their treatments. I fall asleep everytime.

originalText.text:
Earlier this year, I came across City Glow when I was looking for a spot in NYC to upgrade my skin care routine. After getting a few deep pore detox facials (which already felt amazing for my skin) with Anya, she told me that I could benefit from microneedling because of my deep acne scarring and hyperpigmentation. Anya answered all of my questions and made sure I felt comfortable before committing to the procedure. I began regular microneedling treatments around May, and my skin has never looked better a few months later (after just three treatments) -- seriously, it‚Äôs like magic. My skin looks more radiant and even-textured, my pores appear much smaller, and I barely ever get breakouts anymore. Also, I‚Äôve noticed such a difference in my makeup application now that I have a smoother skin base, so my makeup doesn‚Äôt get flaky or patchy anymore. I don‚Äôt even have to use as much makeup anymore because my skin looks beautiful and glowy on its own! I‚Äôm impressed every single time by the results, and I can‚Äôt wait to get my fourth microneedling treatment in a few days.

It didn‚Äôt take long for me to become a loyal City Glow customer. Anya is so knowledgeable and truly cares about your satisfaction with services, and she will make sure you get the results you‚Äôre looking for. Definitely book your next microneedling or other facial appointment here! üòç

If you aren‚Äôt getting your facials here, you are seriously missing out! Was recommended from a friend and it didn‚Äôt disappoint.

The deep pore cleansing facial with Kaylin was top notch and includes ALL of the fixings with an extra relaxing facial massage. 5 stars and a must visit!
